Header: Troops Offer Lunch Treat to Children’s Home
Content: 65 Division troops as part of their community projects offered a hearty lunch treat to 47 children at ‘Mahadeva Swamihall’ Children’s Home at Selvanagar, Kilinochchi on Saturday (27). The project was launched using own money by members of the Army in the 65 Division Headquarters following a suggestion made by Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division in the hope of promoting reconciliation spirits between Army personnel and the civil community.
